Detailed Description

Functions to parse adjourned games message and show result in interface.

CHESSD - WebClient

C3SL - Center for Scientific Computing and Free Software

See interface challenge menu (scripts/interface/challengemenu.js) and data methods to adjourn/postpone game list (scripts/data/data.js)

PS: Currently, adjourn and postpone games are considered the same thing.

function CHALLENGE_HandlePresence (   XML  ) 

Parse presence to adjourn game user;.

Parse presence to user in challenge list. I.E.: if user comes offline the adjourn game with this user turn unavailable to play.

Parameters:
XML XML with adjourned games
Returns:
Buffer with other XMPP to send
Author:
Rubens Suguimoto
